article_text:
$4.395 million

Los Angeles

Four bedrooms, 3½ baths in 6,568 square feet

Built in 1928, this Spanish-style home in the Hancock Park neighborhood includes a two-story turret for an entrance. Inside the turret is a curved staircase lined by the original stained glass windows under a domed ceiling. A second turret is part of the master bedroom.

Agents: Stephen Sigoloff, Aileen Comora and Paul Lester of the Agency

$479,000

Reading, Pa.

Eight bedrooms, 4½ bath in 7,129 square feet

This home in the Centre Park Historic District dates back to 1888. Agent Chris Miller says...

Inside the turret is a curved staircase lined by the original stained glass windows under a domed ceiling.
